channel.title: tor+tor? (Whonix+AnonSurf)
channel.description: Hello, I have a doubt: If I use whonix for gateway and kali for workstation, and if I use a script in the workstation like AnonSurf or Backbox-anonymous I do a connection "TOR+TOR" or I modify only the nodes of the gateway? Thanks.

item.title: tor+tor? (Whonix+AnonSurf)
item.dc:creator: Paoli
item.description:
Hello, I have a doubt:
If I use whonix for gateway and kali for workstation, and if I use a script in the workstation like AnonSurf or Backbox-anonymous I do a connection “TOR+TOR” or I modify only the nodes of the gateway? Thanks.

Read full topic
